PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-07092022-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  CFIA
ActCannabis Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Cannabis Regulations (Listing Ingredients for Edible Cannabis)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANNABIS REGULATIONS in order to (1) simplify and reduce duplication of labelling requirements by harmonizing certain food commodity-specific requirements and by repealing others; and (2) take into account the incorporation by reference of ingredient and component common names.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0145 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
